column4: why are some people grayed out on the right and some people arent, and what does the whois button do? it seems to do nothing
search for whois button output in network tab or in a separate one
try to type /whois Gryllida in the box where you usually type to send thingsto chat; then have many clicks around until you find the line Gryllida <~chatzilla@unaffiliated/...
that line can appear either right in the chat , or in a separate tab, just do many clicks and find
